description: • Developed and deployed into production key PUT and POST endpoints critical for accruing MCC purchase-based rewards, introducing an additional avenue for rewards accrual for 100+ company clients.
• Enhanced accuracy and reduced latency in reward allocation by refactoring existing codebase to dynamically check payment transactions against queried MCC reward rules.
• Improved system reliability and seamless feature integration by implementing validation layers and authoring functional, unit, and integration tests.
• Streamlined judging process by developing a Python app to compute project ranking results, reducing judging time by 40% and ensuring accurate evaluation of 150+ hackathon projects.

• Collaborated with design and tech team to develop user-friendly landing page using NextJS, SCSS, and TypeScript, improving event visibility to 1000+ students and increasing event registration by 30%.
• Spearheaded weekly check-ins, introduced a robust task management system, and conducted regular debugging sessions to enhance productivity and collaboration.
• Accelerated project timelines and improved code quality by conducting code reviews and preaching standard coding practices through constructive feedback.
• Increased web development proficiency amongst student developers by presenting workshops and assigning practice projects over a 10-week curriculum.
• Taught fundamental CS concepts, algorithms, and debugging skills in a Python project-based curriculum.
• Fostered critical thinking skills and promoted good coding practices in design, development, and testing stages.
• Researched backend technologies and kickstarted development for roommate-finding app for UC Davis students.
• Oversaw product development progress by creating development roadmap and assigning weekly tasks.
• Fostered effective communication between engineering team and product managers regarding project progress, ensuring alignment for project success.
• Developed REST API endpoints and expanded reviews database using SQL, Postman, and Java, resulting in more insightful and informative course reviews for 30,000 + UC Davis students.
• Engineered backend of “Report a Bug” page using React and Google Sheets API to efficiently collect and manage user feedback, contributing to improved website quality.
• Designed badge system for student reviewer profiles to offer insights into reviewers’ background and potential bias, enhancing credibility and transparency of the platform.
• Developed and queried email database to assess user eligibility for event registrations, streamlining event management and reducing administrative workload for nonprofit organization.
• Collaborated in cross-functional team of 10+ engineers and designers to ensure quality webpages of high-impact projects.
• Self-taught and leveraged 5+ new programming tools within 10 weeks to enhance efficiency and site functionality, resulting in elevated online presence and mission support of client organizations.
